doc.field: Series I: Labor unions and organizations
Series I: Labor unions and organizations
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives Collection of Labor Movement Serials

This series contains publications issued by national and local unions of transit workers, including a significant number of titles issued by Teamster organizations, encompassing local and rank and file chapters of the International Brotherhood of Teamsters and Teamsters for a Democratic Union. Several other national unions -- Retail, Wholesale & Department Store Union; Transport Workers Union of America; United Auto Workers -- are represented, often by subsidiary groups like Auto Workers United to Fight.
